# mailosaur Provider

Provider for resource management in Mailosaur

## Example Usage

```terraform
provider "mailosaur" {
  api_key = "Test key"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `api_key` (String) Api key for access to Mailosaur. You can use env var MAILOSAUR_API_KEY for set this attribute
